name: 废柴队友 Stupid Teammates
description:
Background

The girl wakes up from the eerie dungeon, and she looks around in fear, unaware that she is about to experience an unforgettable adventure...... Go on an adventure with your buddies and find out the truth behind everything.

gameplay

As a mage, you'll fight alongside two "Stupid teammates." Select the cast direction through ADW, enter the arrows up, down, left, right, and when the arrows match a certain spell sequence, the spell will be automatically released. Diverse enemies, rich spell combinations and entry choices, as well as boss haunts and special levels, bring players a rich and wonderful game experience.Dynamic music sound effects, retro pixel art is also full of highlights!

game duration

Plot mode: 60min+
Challenge mode infinite

Bug feedback and update suggestions

Producer contact QQ: 1223736337
